Flash Wizard Install flashable zips or images Choose an action Install flashable zip (TWRP or CWM required) Install recovery image Install boot image (kernel) Add up to 5 zip files to the flash queue Choose an image file Select zip file to install Select image file to install Flash Recovery Image Flashing Recovery Image Flashing the wrong image may corrupt your recovery partition.

Are you sure you want to proceed? Flash Boot Image (Kernel) Flashing Boot Image Flashing the wrong image may corrupt your boot partition (Kernel). In that case, you may need to reflash your ROM.

Are you sure you want to proceed? BACKUP (TWRP REQUIRED) Create backup %1$s successfully flashed Load flash queue Save flash queue Delete flash queue Create new queue New flash queue Enter a name for your flash queue This queue already exists! "%1$s" successfully deleted Queue is empty

You'll need to restart your device to make your changes effective." "Do you want to convert this app to a user app?

You'll need to restart your device to make your changes effective." Notice This app already exists. Do you want to overwrite the existing app? This system app already exists.

Overwriting system apps may corrupt your system. In that case, you may need to reflash your ROM.

Do you want to overwrite the existing app? This is an updated system app. Please uninstall the update first or try installing as user app. Uninstall app Uninstall system app Do you really want to uninstall this app? Do you really want to uninstall this SYSTEM APP?
Be aware that removing the wrong applications can cause serious problems. In that case you may need to reflash the complete ROM. Please upgrade to the ad-free version.

Alternatively, you can watch a video ad to unlock this feature for this session. Upgrade Play ad Create new list New custom list Enter a name for your custom app list %1$s (%2$d/%3$d) Uninstalling multiple system apps at once is not allowed, because it carries the risk of damaging your ROM.

Please make another selection without any system app. Freezing multiple system apps at once is not allowed, because it carries the risk of damaging your ROM.

Please make another selection without any system app. Select an apk Install "%s" as System app User app Search for apk %1$s successfully uninstalled %1$s successfully extracted "%1$s" successfully created "%1$s" successfully updated No list found This list already exists! Open the quick actions menu by long-pressing a list entry!
In Android Oreo, Root ToolCase requires your permission to read usage stats in order to query the size of installed apps. Grant Ignore
Reboot Reboot your device Soft Reboot Reboot android system only Reboot to Recovery Reboot your device in recovery mode Reboot to Bootloader Reboot your device in download or fastboot mode Power off Switch off your device Restart System UI Restart user interface process Safe Mode Restart in safe mode (without third party apps) Rebooting Restarting Android Rebooting into Recovery Rebooting into Bootloader Powering off Restarting System UI
Reboot to Bootloader Do you really want to reboot your device into the bootloader?

This feature may be disabled in some ROMs. You can probably turn it on in the developer settings.
Reboot to Safe Mode Do you really want to reboot your device in safe mode? Only system apps will be loaded.

To exit safe mode, just reboot your device again. Restarting in Safe Mode
Enable init.d "Init.d emulation allows you to run scripts at startup even on ROMs without native init.d support.

Don't use this option if your ROM has native init.d or you are already using another init.d emulator." New script Enter a name for your script Delete script Changes to %s saved Are you sure you want to delete this script (%s)? Save changes You have unsaved changes.

Save changes now? Run Edit Delete
